text: usane to tumapar keval murdaar aur khoon aur sooar ka maans aur jis par allaah ke atirikt kisee aur ka naam liya gaya ho, haraam thaharaaya hai. isapar bhee jo bahut majaboor aur vivash ho jae, vah avagya karanevaala na ho aur na seema se aage badhanevaala ho to usapar koee gunaah nahin. nissandeh allaah atyant kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
